text: Michael Parks (born Harry Samuel Parks; April 24, 1940 - May 9, 2017)Michael Parks Biography, Film Reference was an American actor and singer. He was known for his roles in Kill Bill and in Django Unchained. Parks died on May 10, 2017 in Los Angeles at the age of 77.Michael Parks dies, aged 77 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Riverside County, California Category:Singers from California
title: Michael Parks
